channel.title: Paul C. Lambert on Paul C. Lambert
channel.description: Recent content in Paul C. Lambert on Paul C. Lambert

item.title: An online interactive tool to improve the understanding of cancer survival statistics
Course: Cancer Predictions: Model-based approaches using Stata
item.description: I am teaching a 1 day course with Mark Rutherford on the use of Age Period Cohort (APC) models for predictions of cancer incidence an mortality. This take place before the Intenational Association of Cancer Registries conference in Utrect on 16th October 2017.

item.title: Course: Competing Risks and multi-state models
item.description:
I am teaching a new three day course with Michael Crowther on competing risks and multi-state models at the Swiss Epidemiology Winter School, 15th-18th January 2018. Details on how to register can be found here.

Practicals will be conducted in Stata, making use of the multistate package in Stata.

We plan to run this course in Leicester and in Stockholm, sometime in 2018.

item.title: A new webpage
item.description:
I have had to move my webpage as the my university was closing down the server where the last one was hosted. I used this “opportunity” to create a new webpage using the excellent guide provided here and some advice from Michael Crowther who has recently started his new website.

This is my first ever blog and at the moment I am unsure how often I will do this.

Software Questions

Sometimes…
